about_the_game:
STRIKER! is a retro-inspired isometric Football Golf game that supports up to 4 players in local, 'pass-the-controller' multiplayer. Play as one of four teams of Strikers, pass the ball from Striker to Striker, then score the goal! Compete to set the fastest times or the fewest shots on each map. Take on your friends across 40 different levels set in five unique worlds, or go it alone and set some course records!

In a unique twist on Football you'll control not just one player, but a team of Strikers, shooting the ball across the level until you're ready to take that final shot and go for goal! Each level features a number of Strikers scattered across the course, and it's up to you to decide your strategy! Will you carefully progress the ball from Striker to Striker, or will you send it down the field with a mighty kick!

Set across four different worlds, each with their own unique theme and mechanics, there are 40+ levels for you to get stuck into! Check out the course with the
Zoom feature, then put your strategy into action! But watch out, you'll have to adapt on the fly if you want to beat the par and win yourself a Platinum Medal.

STRIKER! is a low-input game designed for singleplayer or local multiplayer for up to four players. Take turns playing the level, then watch a combined replay to see who comes out on top. Play through all the courses in campaign mode, or challenge your friends in versus mode to see who's the ultimate STRIKER!

Demo Features


  • 16 distinct levels with scores to beat

  • Customisable game options that can improve accessibility or offer players an added challenge.

  • Level and World Highscores.

  • Customise your Team Name and Kit to make your team really stand out!

  • Simple arcade-inspired controls that are easy to pick up, but difficult to master.

  • A dynamic replay system that lets your save your best moments.

  • Retro-inspired 2.5D Isometric gameplay with a rotatable camera.

  • Unlockable cosmetics.

  • Keyboard & Controller support. Play with up to four players with just one input device!
